name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, Chiang Kai-shek's great-grandson Chiang Youqing came to Ningbo, Zhejiang. During his visit, he said to the camera, "At most 12 years (for Taiwan's return). Let me ask you (Lai Ching-te) a question. Do you have a way to move Taiwan next to the United States? China and Russia are right next to us. How long do you think you can last?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Early morning of August 29: Lawyer Yi Shenghua posted again, saying that as of 1:30 a.m. that day, his colleagues in Taiyuan were still out of contact. Lawyer Yi Shenghua said that his colleagues had nothing to do with the incident. "The next step for Taiyuan police should be to find me. It is the most perfect way to end my career as a lawyer. I really have no regrets."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sydney and Melbourne Mayor Nick Reece joined Xiaohongshu, sparking heated discussions among netizens. Netizens joked, "Our mayor doesn't even bother to come to Xiaohongshu," and "Once Xiaohongshu has a function to close the comment area, maybe (the mayor) will come."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A counselor broke down and cursed in the group because all 22 students in his class failed to find a job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Beijing Statistics Bureau, the number of food delivery drivers in Beijing increased by 49.7% in the first half of 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a recent doctoral graduate in Shanghai revealed his experience of looking for a job for a year and is currently delivering food while looking for a job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens revealed that the flag anthem of the Republic of China played during the flag-raising ceremony of the primary and secondary school track and field competition in Jinzhong City may not be a mistake, but it is really regarded as their sports meeting anthem.
Because the flag-raising ceremony of the 6th Jinzhong City Sports Meeting in 2023 also used "Blue Sky, White Sun and Red Earth".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Li Yang, the founder of "Crazy English", has publicly criticized games many times, saying that the popularity of "Black Myth Wukong" is a national tragedy, and so many people are lying down and doing nothing to play games. He also believes that it should be illegal for adults to play games, and those who make games should be shot. This statement has caused great controversy, but it has also been recognized by a large number of parents in the comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens searched for "Xi Jinping Economic Thought Research Center" on Qichacha and found that as of August 28, 2024, the unit had 214 bidding information nationwide and had also formulated a group standard for the "Guidelines for the Construction of Chinese-style Modern Experimental Bases."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on August 28, BOOS Zhipin's revenue in the second quarter of 2024 was 1.917 billion, up 28.8% year-on-year. In the twelve months ending June 30, 2024, the number of paying corporate customers reached 5.9 million, up 31.1% year-on-year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 29 (Released) Zhengzhou, Henan. Recently, a village bank depositor called Henan Tourism to question Zhang Linlin's promotion. "Zhang Linlin's reinstatement not only insults the IQ of the people across the country, but also tramples on the bottom line of the people across the country." In another call recording, the Organization Department of the Zhengzhou Municipal Party Committee responded to Zhang Linlin's appointment: Her personal adjustment is in line with the prescribed procedures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, in Puyang, Henan, a netizen posted a video saying that a woman was found hanging from a tree in a forest in Malou Town, Taiqian County. It was reported that the woman suffered from depression and committed suicide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 27-29, Gushi County, Henan Province. Depositors posted a video saying that they could not withdraw their money from the Agricultural Bank of Gushi County. "The bank used the people's deposits to build houses for others. The real estate company went bankrupt and the people's money was gone. The bank refused to acknowledge the debt and the lawsuit could not be won."
